description:
Occasionally when I meet a brand new guy, I have him do an audition video before we do anything else. It's kind of an abridged version of a full shoot, but we skip all the preliminary stuff and I just have him strip, watch a porno, and get himself off. It often helps them get over the weirdness of the whole thing and then they can relax a little.
For this week's update I've gone back into my archives and pulled out a couple of audition tapes. I've also included two that were done recently.
A hot, straight redhead with a lean, tight body and a BIG dick. He's really interested in getting into the porn industry but he won't do anything gay (darn). Even so, you'll be seeing more of him.
Fresh out of the Army, this 29 year old has a hairy chest and a goatee. Decided that his girlfriend would be mad if he did any more videos and elected not to pursue it further.
Very, very straight. Cute face and great dick. Was pretty uncomfortable with jerking off in front of another guy. Moved away before we could get him back.
title: Auditions 5
